text: you
the internet of things has emerged as a
critical driver of our technological
future both at work and at home with 6.7
billion data generating devices in use
today and 20 billion projected by 2020
the influence of peyote is everywhere
touching nearly every part of our lives
take Leon he's a senior manager of
manufacturing operations at a large
paper Factory responsible for keeping
the production line operating at peak
performance meeting strict service level
agreements for uptime and output raisa
before dawn after a restless night's
sleep
he prepares for the day utilizing his
IOT enabled smart home asking his Alexa
voice assistant for a weather report a
rundown of the days calendar and
recommendations for the fastest route to
work meanwhile noting his lack of sees
Leon sleep tracker has already told his
espresso maker to add an extra shock
smart sensors turn lights off as he
leaves the house saving money on
electricity arriving at work
Leon views and equipment health report
sourced from thousands of connected
devices machines and sensors running on
Amazon free artists each measuring
critical KPI on the factory floor
everything from the speed and vibration
of the conveyor belts the strength of
the paper being produced and even air
quality the report also provides
suggestions for maintenance using AWS
IOT analytics device data is filtered
transform and start using machine
learning
built and trained in the cloud leaving
work Leon is surrounded by IOT solutions
farm fields enabled by AWS green grass
measuring moisture levels in the soil
and using cloud trained machine learning
models adjust watering patterns even
when Internet connectivity is spotty a
hospital where connected devices acquire
and process critical data improving
diagnostics and patient care in real
time overhead an airplane connects to
the cloud using analytical models to
personalize in-flight entertainment
choices returning home biote
technologies have already lowered Leon's
air conditioning in response to an
unfeasibly cool evening IOT enables Leon
smart TV and entertainment system to
automatically turn on when he walks in
the door with his favorite show queued
ready to relax
he has Alexa prep one last cup of coffee
decaf this time
you
